entry.title: Douglas County Museum Named Top 20 Fan-Favorite Destination in Oregon
entry.summary: The Douglas County Museum of Natural and Cultural History has distinguished itself once again, securing the 20th position among Oregon's Top 100 Fan-Favorite Destinations for 2025.
